backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining game state, dialogue nodes, activities, memorable moments, and canister methods for starting and continuing games.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two admin-gate features to impacted frontend files and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file used in the game.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide for diagnosing and retrying failed IC canister deployments.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Operational instructions for keeping the canister running and handling server offline errors.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating screens, startup, backend checks, game launching, and diagnostics.
frontend/src/config/adminGate.ts: Local admin gate config defining the case-sensitive ADMIN username and storage key.
Defines activity data including trust effects, descriptions, and optional moment unlocks.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Provides a Zustand-based audio manager handling volume, mute state, and background music playback with persistence.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: Renders the 3D Puro character with idle animation and click-to-start-dialogue interaction.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Implements touch-based joystick and look controls for mobile devices.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Combines keyboard, joystick, and look input into unified movement and camera control, respecting pause and terminal states.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Lists available customization items with descriptions and valid placement locations.
Defines branching dialogue nodes with text, choices, trust effects, and optional trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main game container that initializes the game, renders the 3D scene, manages audio, and conditionally displays UI panels and pause logic.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Generates letter responses by selecting template text based on detected keywords in user content.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: Implements a drag-and-drop style book‑sorting game that adjusts trust and completes when all books are categorized.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: Shows a slideshow of Puro’s drawings, rewarding trust as each is viewed and on full completion.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: Implements a timed hide‑and‑seek guessing game where trust changes based on speed and accuracy.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: Provides a menu to launch mini‑games and handles switching and closing logic.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Displays a narrative moment scene with title, text, and a close button.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines moment metadata including scenes, descriptions, and trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Renders the 3D library environment with movement, lighting, objects, and the Puro character.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Zustand store managing trust, dialogue state, progression, UI panels, and persistent game data with various update actions.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Defines ending data and a helper to select the correct ending based on trust thresholds.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Component that displays the final ending based on trust level and allows restarting or returning to title.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Activity selection UI that adjusts trust, completes activities, unlocks moments, and closes after selection.
Panel for placing discovered customization items in the library and viewing already placed items.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Dialogue interface that shows dialogue nodes, filters choices by trust, and updates trust and dialogue state.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Letter-writing UI where players send messages, receive generated responses, and view inbox messages.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Displays a list of unlockable story moments and plays selected moments using MomentPlayer.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Provides a pause overlay with resume, navigation shortcuts, settings access, terminal access, and reset options.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Shows audio settings with mute and volume controls and a back button.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Renders a trust meter card showing trust level, label, and color-coded progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor bound to the user's identity and invalidates queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Checks backend health via actor.isAvailable and exposes status, timestamps, and a refetch method.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for game-related backend calls like state retrieval, choices, activities, customization, and progress reset.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining global CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Runs one‑time startup checks including storage availability and asset preloading.
frontend/src/state/useAdminGateStore.ts: Zustand store managing a persisted local admin unlock state via username matching.
Zustand store for toggling and persisting server access enablement.
frontend/src/ui/AdminAccessPanel.tsx: UI panel that allows unlocking or locking local admin mode through a simple username gate.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays game credits, feature list, and a back button over a themed background.
frontend/src/ui/DiagnosticTerminalOverla: Admin‑gated terminal overlay for diagnostic commands with input, output log, and keyboard shortcuts.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Error screen showing launch failure summary, technical details, and options to retry or return to title.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches game runtime errors and displays a styled error card with optional technical details.
frontend/src/ui/ServerStatusIndicator.ts: UI component that shows server availability status using icons and color-coded labels.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/commands.ts: Implements terminal command parser and executor for diagnostics, server access toggles, and status checks.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalDiag: Formats diagnostic data into readable text lines for the in‑app terminal.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalStor: Zustand store managing terminal visibility and output line history.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Main title screen component providing game start controls, admin tools, server access toggle, and status display.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Normalizes launch-related errors into categorized, user-friendly messages with raw error details preserved.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation explaining the frontend startup process and how to extend initialization logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, plugins, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architectural notes, known issues, and feature definitions for a 3D library-based visual-novel/adventure game. Tracks requirements, backend constraints, and admin-gating logic updates.
